sentences.sContent: Arriving late is a woman’s prerogative .
{"GLOSS":["the rights of kings and queens"],"COLLOINEXA":["the royal prerogative"]}

remMethod.val: pre (预先) + rog (要求) + ative → 事先要求的权力 → 特权

trans.tranOther: a right that someone has, especially because of their importance or social position
